name: OurSiteTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open our site trivia”
”Alexa, start our site trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our site trivia
des:
Play a challenging game of quiz about Uniquely with Alexa.
 If you're just getting started with Uniquely, this will be so mind-boggling! Can you answer all the questions correctly that no one knows? Let's find out! 
Discover the answers. 
Challenge your brain. 
Be up for a mind breaker. 
Release notes:
- New questions added every day
- Choose a nickname for yourself
- Sound effects make the experience even more realistic
What's new:
- Added two new questions
Tips for playing:
- While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. 
- At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz. 
- If you want to redo an answer or your nickname, just say "Alexa, undo". Note: This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
